I hate to admit I have a combined 3,000+ hours on this game. Nothing gives the satisfaction of having a nutty game of CS. I'm good at shooters. I do very well in CoD. Did pretty good in Valorant. Play the occasional game of battlefield. But nothing is better than owning in a game of CS. The challenge to hone your skills and become good is a great challenge. Sometimes less is more. Simplicity is good. Heres to another 20 years of CS.
spent the entire time trying to download a map, pretty fun time
